catalog_script_client.name: 05_Valida UserID

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_d96e8e591b125c10776c0e9fe54bcb92
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Gestão de Usuário">186971c51b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbdd</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:3b64e2c91b5a5810776c0e9fe54bcb3e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>05_Valida UserID</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	var ga = new GlideAjax('x_tivit_user_manag.AjaxUtils');
    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUserByMail');
    ga.addParam('userMail', newValue);
    ga.getXMLAnswer(ajaxResponse);
   
}

function ajaxResponse(answer) {

		if (answer == 'true'){
			g_form.addErrorMessage('User ID '+ newValue +' já está cadastrado!');
			g_form.clearValue('user_id');
		}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>leandro.monteiro@tivit.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-07-28 11:11:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d96e8e591b125c10776c0e9fe54bcb92</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>05_Valida UserID</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="User Management">704931851b5e1810776c0e9fe54bcbde</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d96e8e591b125c10776c0e9fe54bcb92</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>leandro.monteiro@tivit.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-16 19:51:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
